executable.title: Tissue Thresholder
executable.description: Using a pixel thresholder, annotate tissue regions of the WSI

file.name: inputThresholderFile
file.label: Threshold Model
file.description: json file describing the thresholding model to use

region.name: analysis_roi
region.label: Analysis ROI
region.description: Region of Interest (ROI) for analysis. Must be a 4 element vector in the format: (left, top, width, height). Default value is the entire image.

file.name: outputAnnotationFile
file.label: Image Annotation File
file.description: Annotation to relate the image to the source (*.anot)

double.name: analysis_tile_size
double.label: Analysis Tile Size
double.description: Tile Size for blockwise analysis. Default: 1024.

double.name: analysis_mag
double.label: Analysis Magnification
double.description: The magnification at which the analysis should be performed. Default: 10

double.name: min_fgnd_frac
double.label: Minimum Foreground Fraction
double.description: The minimum amount of foreground that must be present in tile for it to be analyzed. Default: 0.25

string.name: scheduler
string.label: Scheduler Address
string.description: Address of a dask scheduler in the format "127.0.0.1:8786". Not passing this parameter sets up a dask cluster on the local machine. 'multiprocessing' uses Python multiprocessing. 'multithreading' uses Python multiprocessing in threaded mode.

integer.name: num_workers
integer.label: Number of Workers
integer.description: Number of dask workers to start while setting up local cluster internally. If a negative value is specified then the number of workers is set to number of CPU cores on the machine minus the number of workers specified.

integer.name: num_threads_per_worker
integer.label: Number of Threads per Worker
integer.description: Number of threads to use per worker while setting up a local cluster internally. Must be a positive integer >= 1.
